content.name: Beta
content.spread: May spread faster than other variants
content.severe_effects: Current data do not indicate more severe illness or death comparatively

content.name: Alpha
content.spread: Spreads much faster than other variants
content.severe_effects: May potentially cause more sickness and death

content.name: Delta
content.spread: Spreads much faster than other variants
content.severe_effects: May cause more severe cases comparatively

content.name: Gamma
content.severe_effects: Current data do not indicate more severe illness or death comparatively

content.name: Omicron
content.spread: The Omicron variant spreads more easily than earlier variants of the virus that cause COVID-19, including the Delta variant.
content.severe_effects: Omicron infection generally causes less severe disease than infection with prior variants.
